title: Chrome Industries Bike shoes get Panaracer Rubber Compound for flats or clipless
content:
For the first time in three years, Chrome Industries issues a significant update on its line of stout, street-conscious shoes. The new line of clipless and flat kicks gets a rubber compound from Panaracer to make the line, according to the brand, its grippiest shoes yet. The Chrome X Panaracer Pedal series updates four classic

The post Chrome Industries Bike shoes get Panaracer Rubber Compound for flats or clipless appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
